This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0682 defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinitionV2 Concept CommentV2 Concept Comment As Published
0 ReadyReadyDoor LockedDoor Locked
1 Not ReadyNot ReadyDoor UnlockedDoor Unlocked

name: DeviceStatus
title: deviceStatus
description: Code system of concepts that communicate the state of a device. Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the SCD segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0682 (Device Status)
